description: Detects when a new credential is added to an existing applcation. Any additional credentials added outside of expected processes could be a malicious actor using those credentials.
false_positives: When credentials are added/removed as part of the normal working hours/workflows
name: Added Credentials to Existing Application
query: properties.message:("Update\ Application\-Certificates\ and\ secrets\ management" OR "Update\ Service\ principal\/Update\ Application")
author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow'
Bailey Bercik '@baileybercik'
